to_if_alone.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "Finder"
    if (selection is {}) then
      display notification "" with title "‚ö†Ô∏è No selection" subtitle "Finder Vim Mode"
      beep
    else
      repeat with aFolder in (selection as list)
        open aFolder
      end repeat
    end if
  end tell'

to.shell_command: qlmanage -p "$HOME/.config/karabiner/assets/finder-vim-mode/cheatsheet.png"
qlmanage -p "$HOME/.config/karabiner/assets/finder-vim-mode/cheatsheet.png"

killall Finder
osascript -e 'display notification "üîÅ Restarting Finder‚Ä¶" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'
afplay "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/screen_sharing_started.caf" &

osascript -e '
  tell application "Finder"
    repeat while Finder window 2 exists
      close Finder window 2
    end repeat
  end tell'

to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e ' tell application "Finder" to set the selection to files of Finder window 1'

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "Finder"
    if the selection is {} then return
    activate
  end tell
  delay 0.1
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    tell value of attribute "AXFocusedUIElement" to perform action "AXShowMenu"
  end tell'

to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "‚úÖ File(s) copied" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "‚úÖ File(s) copied" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

to_if_alone.shell_command:
selection=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (selection as text)')
export LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8" # fixes encoding issue when copying
cat "$selection" | pbcopy
osascript -e 'display notification "‚úÖ File content copied" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

to.shell_command:
selection=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (selection as text)')
cat "$selection" | pbcopy
osascript -e 'display notification "‚úÖ File content copied" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

to_if_alone.shell_command:
osascript -e'
  tell application "Finder"
    if (number of Finder windows is not 2) then
      display notification "" with title "‚ö†Ô∏è Not exactly two windows" subtitle "Finder Vim Mode"
      beep
    else if (the selection is {}) then
      display notification "" with title "‚ö†Ô∏è No selection" subtitle "Finder Vim Mode"
      beep
    else
      set otherWin to (target of Finder window 2 as alias)
      repeat with f in (selection as list)
        move f to otherWin
      end repeat
    end if
  end tell'

osascript -e'
  tell application "Finder"
    if (number of Finder windows is not 2) then
      display notification "" with title "Finder Vim Mode" subtitle "‚ö†Ô∏è Not exactly two windows"
      beep
    else if (the selection is {}) then
      display notification "" with title "Finder Vim Mode" subtitle "‚ö†Ô∏è No selection"
      beep
    else
      set otherWin to (target of Finder window 2 as alias)
      repeat with f in (selection as list)
        duplicate f to otherWin
      end repeat
    end if
  end tell'

osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    click menu item "Show Preview Options" of menu "View" of menu bar 1
  end tell'

to.shell_command:
current_vol=$(osascript -e 'output volume of (get volume settings)')
[[ "$current_vol" == "missing value" ]] && current_vol=50
vol_percent=$(echo "scale=2 ; $current_vol / 100" | bc) # afplay play with 100% volume by default
afplay --volume "$vol_percent" "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/facetime/multiway_join.caf" &

to_if_alone.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "Finder"
    set thisFolder to the target of the Finder window 1 as alias
    set newFile to (make new file at thisFolder)
    select newFile
  end tell'

current_vol=$(osascript -e 'output volume of (get volume settings)')
[[ "$current_vol" == "missing value" ]] && current_vol=50
vol_percent=$(echo "scale=2 ; $current_vol / 100" | bc) # afplay play with 100% volume by default
afplay --volume "$vol_percent" "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/begin_record.caf" &

to.shell_command:
selectedFiles=$(osascript -e '
  tell application "Finder" to set selectedFiles to (every item of (get selection))
  set out to ""
  repeat with theFile in selectedFiles
    set out to out & (POSIX path of (theFile as text)) & linefeed
  end repeat
  return out
')
[[ -z "$selectedFiles" ]] && return 1

echo "$selectedFiles" | sed -e 's|/$||' -e '/^$/d' | while read -r file; do
  lastFourChars=$(echo "$file" | rev | cut -c-4 | rev) # bash expansion does not work in karabiner
  if [[ "$lastFourChars" == "-bkp" ]]; then
    newName=$(echo "$file" | rev | cut -c5- | rev)
  else
    newName="${file}-bkp"
  fi
  mv -n "$file" "$newName"
done
afplay "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/begin_record.caf" &

sel=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (selection as text)')
if [[ -f "$sel" ]] ; then
    ln -sf "$sel" "${sel}-symlink"
    open -R "${sel}-symlink"
elif [[ -d "$sel" ]] ; then
    # cannot use bash expansion here, therefore rev & cut
    sel="$(echo "$sel" | rev | cut -c2- | rev)"
    ln -sf "$sel" "${sel}-symlink"
    open -R "${sel}-symlink"
fi

selection=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to return POSIX path of (selection as text)')
open -R "$(readlink -f "$selection")"

to_if_alone.shell_command:
SEL=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to POSIX path of (item 1 of (get selection) as text)')
selection_count=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to count (selection as list)')

if [[ -d "$SEL" && $selection_count -eq 1 ]] ; then
  cd "$SEL"
  foldername=$(basename "$SEL")
  zip -r "../$foldername.zip" .
  open -R "../$foldername.zip"

  current_vol=$(osascript -e 'output volume of (get volume settings)')
  vol_percent=$(echo "scale=2 ; $current_vol / 100" | bc) # afplay play with 100% volume by default
  (afplay --volume "$vol_percent" "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/Volume Mount.aif" &)
else
  osascript -e '
    tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
      click menu item "Compress" of menu "File" of menu bar 1
    end tell'
fi

to.shell_command:
SEL=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to POSIX path of (item 1 of (get selection) as text)')
selection_count=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to count (selection as list)')

if [[ -d "$SEL" && $selection_count -eq 1 ]] ; then
  cd "$SEL"
  foldername=$(basename "$SEL")
  zip -r "../$foldername.zip" .
  open -R "../$foldername.zip"

  current_vol=$(osascript -e 'output volume of (get volume settings)')
  vol_percent=$(echo "scale=2 ; $current_vol / 100" | bc) # afplay play with 100% volume by default
  (afplay --volume "$vol_percent" "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/Volume Mount.aif" &)
else
  osascript -e '
    tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
      click menu item "Compress" of menu "File" of menu bar 1
    end tell'
fi
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/facetime/multiway_leave.caf' &

to_if_alone.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    click menu item "Back" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1
  end tell'

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
  tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder"
    click menu item "Forward" of menu "Go" of menu bar 1
  end tell'

selectedFiles=$(osascript -e '
	tell application "Finder" to set selectedFiles to (every item of (get selection))
	set out to ""
	repeat with theFile in selectedFiles
		set out to out & (POSIX path of (theFile as text)) & linefeed
	end repeat
	return out
')
[[ -z "$selectedFiles" ]] && return 1

parent_dir=$(dirname "$(echo "$selectedFiles" | head -n1)")

echo "$selectedFiles" | while read -r item; do
	[[ ! -d "$item" ]] && continue
  # `mv -n` ensures no file is overwritten, and `rmdir` ensures
  # only empty directories are removed
	find "$item" -mindepth 1 -print0 -not -type d | 
		xargs -0 -I {} mv -n "{}" "$parent_dir"
	find "$item" -print0 -type d | xargs -0 rmdir
done

current_vol=$(osascript -e 'output volume of (get volume settings)')
[[ "$current_vol" == "missing value" ]] && current_vol=50
vol_percent=$(echo "scale=2 ; $current_vol / 100" | bc) # afplay play with 100% volume by default
afplay --volume "$vol_percent" "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/Volume Mount.aif" &
osascript -e 'display notification "‚úÖ File(s) copied" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

afplay "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/end_record.caf" &
osascript -e 'display notification "‚¨áÔ∏è Sort by name" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

afplay "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/end_record.caf" &
osascript -e 'display notification "‚¨ÖÔ∏è Sort by modification date" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

afplay "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/end_record.caf" &
osascript -e 'display notification "‚¨ÜÔ∏è Sort by size" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

afplay "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/end_record.caf" &
osascript -e 'display notification "‚û°Ô∏è Sort by kind" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

afplay "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/end_record.caf" &
osascript -e 'display notification "üîö Sort by tags" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &
afplay '/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/acknowledgment_sent.caf' &

osascript -e 'display notification "‚òÅÔ∏è üîÅ Restarting iCloud‚Ä¶" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'
afplay "/System/Library/Components/CoreAudio.component/Contents/SharedSupport/SystemSounds/system/screen_sharing_started.caf" &
killall bird
osascript -e 'display notification "‚úÖ Filepath copied" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'
osascript -e 'display notification "‚úÖ Filename copied" with title "Finder Vim Mode"'

GIT_OPTIONAL_LOCKS=0
SEL=$(osascript -e 'tell application "Finder"
  set sel to (item 1 of (get selection) as text)
  return POSIX path of sel
end tell')
if [[ ! -f "$SEL" ]] ; then
  osascript -e 'display notification "‚ö†Ô∏è Selection not a file." with title "Finder Vim Mode"'
  exit 1
fi
cd "$(dirname "$SEL")" || exit 1
if ! git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree &>/dev/null ; then
  osascript -e 'display notification "‚ö†Ô∏è File not in a git repo." with title "Finder Vim Mode"'
  exit 1
fi

BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current)
ROOT_PATH=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)
ROOT_LEN=${#ROOT_PATH}
REMOTE_URL="$(git remote -v | head -n1 | cut -f2 | cut -d' ' -f1 | sed -e's/:/\//' -e 's/git@/https:\/\//' -e 's/\.git//')"
PATH_IN_REPO=${SEL:$ROOT_LEN}
PATH_IN_REPO=$(osascript -l JavaScript -e "encodeURIComponent('$PATH_IN_REPO')")

URL="$REMOTE_URL/blob/$BRANCH/$PATH_IN_REPO"
echo "$URL" | pbcopy
open "$URL"
